name: NoteBoy
description:
NoteBoy is a static platformer in which you have to survive avoiding the enemies, jumping over them.

The notebook will split more and more, and you’ll have to control more noteboys. 

CONTROLS

Click for everything.

TOOLS
  • Unity C#
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Audacity
  • Ampermusic
